summary: A modula sexy bunny suit for male (S.o.S. oriented)
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]
Description:
An interchangeable parts bunny suit for male, more or less sexy (it's your choice).
The suit is based on S.o.S. default body meshes for humanoid races[/size] [size=4]ONLY WEIGHT 100[/size]* [size=3](for now).


[size=2]*Make sure to set weight to 100. Unequip all suit parts and In the console for Player via [u]showracemenu[/u] for NPC just Target NPC and type [u]SetNPCweight[/u] 100
Re-equip suit parts.[/size]

Location:
Entering Dragonsreach on the right there is a barrel between 2 benchs. You can find it there.

Installation:
NMM: Answer "No" and "Yes To All"
Manual: Copy all 3 files in Data/ and activate the .esp

Note: Using it in conjunction with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57059/?tab=4&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fthread_id%3D2013629%26mod_id%3D57059]T71's Personal Follower plus Underwear Mania (Male)[/url] you can enrich accessories suit, anyway, this mod will be included in the next update of it.
The body textures are from my other mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56487/?]Another Hairy Body Textures For Schlongs of Skyrim

[/url]
Changelog:

V1.5 (Main Update):
1 Bunny Shawl Black
1 Bunny Gloves Black
1 Bunny (Pseudo) BDSM Suit
1 High Boots
2 Jacket Color Variants*
4 Bonus Skeleton Armor Color Variants (2 screenshots in my blog)
[size=2]
*Clipping issue (back arms) in some positions. If anyone can fix it is welcome! :)
(I tried to fix it but with no success)
[/size]

[size=3]V1.4 (Main Update)[/size]
Added:
2 Sneaker Shoes [size=3]Color Variant[/size]s
2 Bunny Ears Down Color Variants
1 Bunny Mad Hatter Hat
1 Bunny Witchunter Hat
Fixed Ears in Bunny Hat
Changed equip slot for Shawl


V1.3 (Main Update)
Added:
1 Shawl
2 Mask variants
1 Fine Shoes
1 Bunny Top Hat
1 [size=3]Bunny [/size]Miner's Hat
1 [size=3]Bunny [/size]Uniform Hat.
Reverted to white version the Bunny Ears (Pinky look strange)
Repositioned Bunny Ears in the Bunny Hat.


V1.2 (Main Update)*
Added:
1 Bunny Hat
1 Warm Hat
1 Runners
1 Vest
1 Shorts (w/o suspenders version).
Modified Pants textures (little more bumpy) and Bunny ears (little more pinky).

[size=2]*(There are 2 syntax errors that will corrected in next main update).[/size]


V1.1 (Main Update)
Added:
1 Belt
1 Armlets,
1 Pants (w/oÂ  suspenders version)
1 Gloves.
Modified Shoes textures to match main theme :D


V1.0
Initial release.[/size]
[center]
I MADE IT JUST FOR FUN
...if you don't like it ignore this thread but please spare us your comments.
THANK YOU! ^^[/center]
